statements.select: select * from ProduceMaterialExitDetail where ProduceMaterialExitId in (select ProduceMaterialExitId from ProduceMaterialExit where (WorkHouseId=#houseid# or #houseid# is null) and ProduceExitMaterialDate between #startDate# and #enddate#)

SELECT * FROM ProduceMaterialExitDetail detail INNER JOIN ProduceMaterialExit pm ON pm.ProduceMaterialExitId = detail.ProduceMaterialExitId WHERE ((pm.ProduceExitMaterialDate>=#starDate# OR #starDate# IS NULL) AND (pm.ProduceExitMaterialDate<=#endDate# OR #endDate# IS NULL)) AND ((pm.ProduceMaterialExitId>=#produceMaterialExitId0# OR #produceMaterialExitId0# IS NULL) AND (pm.ProduceMaterialExitId<=#produceMaterialExitId1# OR #produceMaterialExitId1# IS NULL)) AND detail.ProductId IN (SELECT ProductId FROM Product WHERE (productname>=#pId0# OR #pId0# IS NULL) AND (productname<=#pId1# OR #pId1# IS NULL)) AND detail.DepotPositionId IN(SELECT DepotPositionId FROM Department WHERE (Id>=#dId0# OR #dId0# IS NULL) AND (Id<=#dId1# OR #dId1# IS NULL)) AND ((pm.PronoteHeaderID>=#pronoteId0# OR #pronoteId0# IS NULL) AND (pm.PronoteHeaderID<=#pronoteId1# OR #pronoteId1# IS NULL))
